Posts.EditableText: Anyone planning to enter a Quest game in the IFComp this year? You have until September 1st to declare your intention to enter, then until September 30th to actually submit your game. http://www.ifcomp.org/comp11/enter.html
Posts.HTML:
Anyone planning to enter a Quest game in the IFComp this year?

You have until September 1st to declare your intention to enter, then until September 30th to actually submit your game.

http://www.ifcomp.org/comp11/enter.html
